changeLog: Changed the drilling/chainsawing (is this a word?) animation. It now looks like you're actually 'drilling into the block'
Added config options to enable/disable the animation in 1st and 3rd person mode
Mode switch sounds can now be disabled by putting a tool and a block of Wool (or a Sound Muffler if ExU is installed) into a workbench
If you want to get the sounds back, combine the tool with s Note Block
Config options for mode switch sound no longer exist - they will get deleted from your configs automatically
